TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
By intro-ing into into somebody else.

Who parked their car... on my SANDWICH?

ask the guys who messed with google traduc, they might know it's probably lost in the tagalog send wish translation

Why "magpadala ng hiling" is translated back send re(-)quest ?

SOMETHING

how to space?

By visiting the space-bar.

Can you give me directions to the space-bar?

Sure, turn up at 9223Ã‹Å¡ and just go back towards your behind.

Does the 20 count 49?

Who knows...

What's the answer for all the questions of life?

Inside a snail's shell on the back of a turtle.

How do I open a can of Vienna sausages?

With a can opener.

What was the best thing before sliced bread?

Sliced bread

why is my poop rainbow colored and shaped like a unicorn?

Beacuse it is.

Why is my face morphing green?

Because it's lime flavoured.

If drivers drive, seekers seek and bumpers bump, why don't fingers fing?

because the atoms and whatever else translators will and have to translate ; ) what else ?

Does "why drink and drive when you can smoke and fly ?" is equal to "why ask a pertinent question when you can give a stupid answer ?" ?

By Maths.

How do human go to n land on Sun?

Obvi'sly y'go at night when th' sun ain't shinin'.

Why did Skylab have to burn up?

it knew too much...........

illuminati confirmed

why does templars not confirmed as illuminati?

Because they were all burned up before illuminati confirmed and the evidence has burned with them.

What is the meaning of the forum games?

To be.

What is taking so long?!

The half-life of hydrogen-7 is only of 2.3x10^-23. I do not see this as long.

Why is there no Duna, only Jool ?!

I Duna know. Jool have to work it out for yourself.

Where's my sandwich?

There is no sandwich, it was a metaphor for the hunger of the spirit. With peanut butter.

What is love?

Baabeee dont hurt meee. Don't hurt meeeeeeee no mo.

Where did you come from, where did ya go? Where did ya come from, cotton eye Joe?

Aw, he's just a Redneck.

Who took the cookie from the cookie jar?

Me.

Do you expect me to talk, Goldfinger?

Yes

So mama, did god create the earth in 6 days?

No earth was created in one second

How to mun?
